dsOverview.title: NCDC U.S. Summary of Day, various stations 1890-1970

summary.p: This dataset contains summary of day data for various U.S. stations over the period 1890 to 1970.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCDC > National Climatic Data Center, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Precipitation > Precipitation Amount
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Temperature > Air Temperature
